titleStmt.title: An answer to a book, entituled, Reason and authority, or, The motives of a late Protestant's reconciliation to the Catholick Church together with a brief account of Augustine the monk, and conversion of the English : in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Bainbrigg, Thomas, 1636-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for Brabazon Aylmer ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Bainbrigg. Cf. Halkett & Laing ( 2nd ed.).
